an6.25:1.4: ‘itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an6.25:1.5: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasavako tathagatam anussarati, nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.25:1.6: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti, nikkhantam muttam vutthitam gedhamha.
an6.25:1.8: Idampi kho, bhikkhave, arammanam karitva evam’idhekacce satta visujjhanti.

an6.25:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako attano cagam anussarati:
an6.25:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako devata anussarati:
an6.25:6.2: ‘santi deva catumaharajika, santi deva tavatimsa, santi deva yama, santi deva tusita, santi deva nimmanaratino, santi deva paranimmitavasavattino, santi deva brahmakayika, santi deva tatuttari.
an6.25:6.3: Yatharupaya saddhaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tattha upapanna; mayhampi tatharupa saddha samvijjati.
an6.25:6.7: pannaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tattha upapanna; mayhampi tatharupa panna samvijjati’ti.
an6.25:7.1: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasavako attano ca tasanca devatanam saddhanca silanca sutanca caganca pannanca anussarati nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.25:7.2: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti, nikkhantam muttam vutthitam gedhamha.
an6.25:7.4: Idampi kho, bhikkhave, arammanam karitva evam’idhekacce satta visujjhanti.
